titleStmt.title: Ane answer to the tractiue, set furth in the yeir of God. 1558. be maister Quintine Kennedy Commendatar, Abbote of Crosraguell, for the establisching of ane Christiane mannis conscience (as he alledgis) the forth and strenth of his Papistrie, and all vthers of his sect, as appearis weil be his epistle direct to the Protestantes, and prentit in the last part of this buik: maid be maister Iohne Dauidsone, Maister of the Paedagog of Glasgw.
titleStmt.author: Davidson, John, ca. 1520-1572.
Kennedy, Quintin, 1520-1564. Compendius tractive conforme to the scripture.

notesStmt.note: A response to STC 14392, Quentin Kennedy's "Ane compedius tractive conforme to the scripture", that includes Kennedy's tract.
Running title reads: The confutatione of M.Q. Ken. Papisticall councels.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
